coded_answer.p: I'm writing to you as regards the letter you've sent me about the competition I've won.

I've never been to the U.S.A. before so I think it'll be an exciting trip. With regard to the date of the trip, July would be best because in June I'm going to visit my family in Mexico and in August school begins.
I've never been camping before, I guess I'm not an outdoor girl, but I'd like to give it a try, so I'd rather tents than cabins.

I'm really keen on sports, especially sailing. I've practisedbeen sailing since an early age and I perfectly manage the rigging and sailmanage the rigging and sail perfectly. I'm also fond of tennis, I've just started my lessons and would like to continue practisingplaying during the summer. So, I think I'll do sailing and tennis.

I'm a shopaholic, but I have to admit shopping is not always enjoyable. For instance, I spent my Spring Break with my friends in Italy, we. We went there to buy our dresses for our boyfriends' graduation (besides other reasons). They had invited us and we wanted them to see us looking stunningly beautiful.

While we were in Florence my wallet was stolen, probably by a gypsiegypsy. I was so annoyed! I was in the Plaza Espagna in Florence without a penny!
